title: Find First N Matches
description: In this lab, we will explore the findFirstN() function in JavaScript. This function is used to find the first n elements in an array for which a given function returns a truthy value. We will learn how to use findFirstN() in combination with other array methods to manipulate and extract specific data from arrays.

meta.title: Find First N Matches in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to use the findFirstN() function in JavaScript to find the first n elements in an array that meet a certain criteria.
meta.keywords: matching, javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, programming tutorial, javascript lab, javascript tutor, array, findfirstn

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 找到前 N 个匹配项
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索 JavaScript 中的 findFirstN() 函数。此函数用于在数组中查找前 n 个元素，对于这些元素，给定函数返回真值。我们将学习如何将 findFirstN() 与其他数组方法结合使用，以操作和从数组中提取特定数据。

meta.title: 在 JavaScript 中找到前 N 个匹配项
meta.description: 学习如何使用 JavaScript 中的 findFirstN() 函数在数组中找到满足特定条件的前 n 个元素。
meta.keywords: 匹配, JavaScript, JavaScript 练习, 在线 JavaScript 练习, 编程教程, JavaScript 实验, JavaScript 教程, 数组, findfirstn
